parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and spao; to drag forth, i.e. unsheathe, or relatively retire.
As if, as it were, like; with numbers: about. From hos and ei; as if.
A stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building. Apparently a primary word; a stone.
A casting, throw; in acc: as measure of distance. From ballo; a throw.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To put, place, lay, set, fix, establish. A prolonged form of a primary theo to place.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pray, pray for, offer prayer. From pros and euchomai; to pray to God, i.e. Supplicate, worship.
